text:
[Verse]
Under the stars we glow
Nighttime whispers slow
In the dark we know
The moon has us in tow

[Verse 2]
Feet tap on the ground
Heartbeats the only sound
In the night we’re found
Lost and spellbound

[Chorus]
Dance with me tonight
In the soft moonlight
Till the break of dawn
We'll keep moving on

[Verse 3]
Shadows weave and sway
Chasing dreams away
Until the new day
We’re here to stay

[Verse 4]
Hands clasped tight in mine
In this world we shine
Nothing left behind
In this moment’s sign

[Chorus]
Dance with me tonight
In the soft moonlight
Till the break of dawn
We'll keep moving on
title: Moonlit Dance
